project_abstract.cdata: The project would assist in financing (i) the construction of highways in Slovenia, Macedonia and Kosovo, and (ii) the purchase of engineering equipment, consulting services and staff training abroad to help Republics and Provinces improve highway planning, administration and project preparation.
